text: @Havocsan @Femi_Sorry @BorisJohnson Hey, can I support you on that. Me too. Odd stuff, cough, then gone, mild neuralgia then gone, not loss of smell, increased. Sudden increase in heart rate and short of breath. Then gone. Tired plus. Still mild occasional cough. Aches. etc.. Temperature up not high for 2 days.
